other_tests.findings: Mild splenic enlargement, with the spleen measuring 14.3 cm in length; the liver was normal in size and echotexture.
Grade I varices in the lower third of the esophagus; otherwise normal results.
Established cirrhosis, characterized by diffuse bridging fibrosis and nodularity; focal macrovesicular steatosis; extensive copper deposition in hepatocytes.
